original_text: But as for me, behold, I am in your hands. Do with me as seems good and right to you.
korean_text: 보라 나는 너희 손에 있으니 너희 의견에 좋은 대로, 옳은 대로 하려니와

sentences.original_text: behold, I am in your hands.
Do with me as seems good and right to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 선하고 의롭게 보이는 대로 나에게 행하라.
